entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing after midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Saturday 18 March 2023
